languages.text: "С меня довольно. Я не готов{mf||а} терпеть эту ересь рядом с собой!"
"I have heard enough. I will not tolerate this heresy near me!"
languages.original_text: "С меня довольно. Я не готов{mf||а} терпеть эту ересь рядом с собой!"

traits.locale_text: "I have heard enough. I will not tolerate this heresy near me!"
"I have heard enough. I will not tolerate this heresy near me!"
"I have heard enough. I will not tolerate this heresy near me!"
"I have heard enough. I will not tolerate this heresy near me!"

languages.text: “我不想再听了，我不允许我身边出现这种异端邪说！”
languages.original_text: "I have heard enough. I will not tolerate this heresy near me!"

traits.locale_text: “我不想再听了，我不允许我身边出现这种异端邪说！”

languages.text: «He oído suficiente. ¡No toleraré esta herejía delante de mis narices!».
languages.original_text: "I have heard enough. I will not tolerate this heresy near me!"

traits.locale_text: «He oído suficiente. ¡No toleraré esta herejía delante de mis narices!».

languages.text: 「もう十分だ。{mf|俺|私}は、こんな異端者を許さない」
languages.original_text: "I have heard enough. I will not tolerate this heresy near me!"

traits.locale_text: 「もう十分だ。{mf|俺|私}は、こんな異端者を許さない」

languages.text: « J'en ai assez entendu. Je ne tolérerai pas cette hérésie une seconde de plus ! »
languages.original_text: "I have heard enough. I will not tolerate this heresy near me!"

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai assez entendu. Je ne tolérerai pas cette hérésie une seconde de plus ! »

languages.text: "Ich habe genug gehört. Ich dulde diese Ketzerei in meiner Nähe nicht!"
languages.original_text: "I have heard enough. I will not tolerate this heresy near me!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe genug gehört. Ich dulde diese Ketzerei in meiner Nähe nicht!"

languages.text: "Yeterince dinledim. Huzurumda böyle bir kâfirliğe müsaade edemem!"
languages.original_text: "I have heard enough. I will not tolerate this heresy near me!"

traits.locale_text: "Yeterince dinledim. Gözümün önündeki böyle bir kâfirliğe müsaade edemem!"
